title: If it takes 55 million years for the light around the black hole to reach us, could it have expanded so rapidly in that time that it’s much closer than it appears now? - Quora

response.answer_text: The universe doesn’t expand that way. You’re thinking there’s a point from which space is created and so bodies can get closer together However it expands in such a way that bodies always get further apart, no matter their relative position.
